Package view

Class View

java.lang.Object
view.View
All Implemented Interfaces:
UIStrategy
public class View
extends java.lang.Object
implements UIStrategy
The View for a Reversi game.

    • updateBoard

      public void updateBoard​(Board board, Position selectedPosition, java.util.LinkedList<Tile> flippedPieces)
      Updates the board according to the piece played. This method does not change the state of the board, it merely displays changes that were made.
      Specified by:
      updateBoard in interface UIStrategy
      Parameters:
      board - The board
      selectedPosition - The position of the piece that was just played
      flippedPieces - The pieces that were flipped during this turn.
